interface.name: vpn_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute VPN clients in the vpnc domain.

interface.name: vpn_run
interface.summary: Execute VPN clients in the vpnc domain, and allow the specified role the vpnc domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the vpnc domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the vpnc domain to use.

interface.name: vpn_signal
interface.summary: Send generic signals to VPN clients.
